Magic Notes:
Insidious Magic: DC 9+foe level check to detect Weave magic, Foe DC 17 check to detect Shadow Weave spell
Pernicious Magic: Weave foes DC 17 check to counterspell, DC 9+foe level to counterspell Weave foes
Shadow Weave Magic: +1 DC and resistance checks on enchantment, illusion, necromancy, and darkness descriptor spells, -1 caster level on evocation and transmutation, no light descriptor spells
Tenacious Magic: Weave foes DC 21 to dispel, DC 13+foe level to dispel Weave foes
Widen Spell: x2 area of affect uses +3 spell slot
Notes
Familiar: Weasel "Himpputefem"
Familiar Features: Companion Alertness; Companion Evasion; Companion Improved Evasion; Deliver Touch Spells; Empathic Link; Share Spells; Speak With Master

Companion Notes:
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed save yields half damage
Deliver Touch Spells: Deliver touch spells if in contact w/master when cast
Empathic Link: Share emotions up to 1 mile
Share Spells: Master share self spell w/companion w/in 5'
